author: By MICHAEL BIESECKER, MIKE STOBBE and MATTHEW PERRONE Associated Press
title: Testing blunders crippled US response as coronavirus spread
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — A series of missteps at the nation's top public health agency caused a critical shortage of reliable laboratory tests for the coronavirus, hobbling the federal response as the pandemic spread across the country like wildfire, an Associated…
